DESeqAnalysis 0.1.22

  • Changelog

DESeqResults matrix

Source: R/resultsMatrix-methods.R
resultsMatrix.Rd

Generate an aggregate matrix of DESeqResults values.

resultsMatrix(object, ...)

# S4 method for DESeqAnalysis
resultsMatrix(object,
  value = c("log2FoldChange", "stat", "padj"))

# S4 method for DESeqAnalysisList
resultsMatrix(object,
  value = c("log2FoldChange", "stat", "padj"))

Arguments

object

DESeqAnalysis.
value

character(1). Value type to return. Corresponds to supported DESeqResults column:

  • log2FoldChange: log2 fold change. This will return shrunken LFC values if they are slotted in the DESeqAnalysis object.

  • stat: Wald test statistic.

  • padj: BH adjusted P value.
...

Additional arguments.

Value

matrix.

Examples

data(deseq)
x <- resultsMatrix(deseq)
#> Generating results matrix from lfcShrink slot using log2FoldChange column.
head(x)
#>         condition_B_vs_A
#> gene001       1.38931178
#> gene002      -0.17798108
#> gene003      -1.75907906
#> gene004      -1.93787239
#> gene005       0.19497655
#> gene006      -0.02967514
